text: Sadie Anderson (born 25 May 1990) is an American rugby union player. She played for the United States women's national rugby union team at the 2014 Women's Rugby World Cup. She played for Pennsylvania State University. == References == ==Other websites== * Interview with Sadie Anderson - USA Women's National Team Fly-Half, USARugbyNatlOffice Nov 1, 2012 Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:American rugby union players
title: Sadie Anderson
